application.summary: Import and edit images in the RAW format

description.p: The Unidentified Flying Raw (UFRaw) is an application that decodes RAW format image files and allows you to manipulate them, changing parameters such as the exposure and white balance of the image. UFRaw uses the DCRaw RAW decoder, and supports the RAW format of over 600 cameras, including many Sony, Nikon, Canon and Fuji cameras.
